item.description:
Freedom Is Fundamental Book Club and Discussion Group will host an open and free discussion surrounding the events of the Republican National Convention (RNC) which occurred over these past two weeks. 

We will have members of the Rhode Island delegation present to recount what transpired at the convention and why the event is now so controversial. 

We will lay out what happened in the Platform Committee and the Rules Committee and go over how the Republican National Convention (RNC) is different than the Republican National Committee (RNC) and how the Republican Party in the United States is a member of the International Democrat Union.

We will also watch video clips that you may not have seen on Television.

This informational meeting is FREE and open to everyone regardless of political affiliation.   FREE healthy snacks will be served as well. 

PLEASE JOIN US AND BRING A FRIEND!

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: Discussion of the Republican National Convention
